quote: Sarcasm is the last refuge of the imaginatively bankrupt.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quote: You see, that is the sad, sorry, terrible thing about sarcasm.It's really funny.
author: Brandon Sanderson,  Alcatraz Versus the Evil Librarians

quote: I'm a sarcastic person, and people don't get my humor sometimes.
author: Sarah Hyland

quote: Can the sarcasm,' he said. 'Please, I always use fresh sarcasm, never canned.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  Circus of the Damned

quote: I am in full possession of the amazing power of being sarcastic.
author: Sarah Rees Brennan,  The Demon's Covenant

quote: Getting married is like trading in the adoration of many for the sarcasm of one.
author: Mae West

quote: Making others happy, through kindness of speech and sincerity of right advice, is a sign of true greatness. To hurt another soul by sarcastic words, looks, or suggestions, is despicable.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda,  Where There is Light: Insight and Inspiration for Meeting Life's Challenges

quote: I'll speak for myself, but there's a lot of humor to be found in sarcasm and darkness. You talk to any paramedic, they survive by developing a pretty off-kilter sense of humor.
author: Nicolas Cage

quote: I grew up as a very sarcastic person. I was always the class clown, and to date girls, I had to be really funny. I was really skinny growing up. I was so thin, I had to run around in the shower to get wet. That kind of thin. So I always had to rely on humor and sarcasm.
author: Kurt Fuller

quote: Humor and seriousness are not in opposition to each other.
author: Al Franken

quote: I have wit in my work and a sense of humor, but I do not use irony in any way.
author: John Zorn

quote: Sometimes Americans don't quite get my sense of humor. My good ol' British sarcasm seems to go over their heads.
author: Lee Westwood

quote: Humor is everywhere in that there's irony in just about anything a human does.
author: Bill Nye

quote: Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: We do not take humor seriously enough.
author: Konrad Lorenz

quote: You know, considering your IQ, you're really socially retarded sometimes.
author: Shannon Delany,  13 to Life

quote: This is what happened in love. One of you cried a lot and then both of you grew sarcastic.
author: Lorrie Moore,  Like Life

quote: I don't have a very quick sense of humor.
author: Florenz Ziegfeld

quote: The key to humor is often self-loathing or sarcasm. In a sense, that's how self-loathing is made palatable.
author: James Gray

quote: Humor brings insight and tolerance. Irony brings a deeper and less friendly understanding.
author: Agnes Repplier

quote: They say sarcasm is the lowest form of wit,"Valkyrie said. China glanced at her. "They've obviously never met me.
author: Derek Landy,  Mortal Coil

quote: The most dangerous irony is, people are angry with others because of their own incompetence.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Incredibly intelligent people always seem odd to those who are not as sharp.
author: Alexei Maxim Russell,  Why Not-World

quote: I just am a snob when it comes to humor.
author: Courteney Cox

quote: Oh sorry, I was taking life seriously.
author: Bill Hicks

quote: Everyone has a sense of humor. If you don't laugh at jokes, you probably laugh at opinions.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: If you cannot find an element of Humour in something, your not taking it seriously enough.
author: Ilyas Kassam

quote: Humor is the affectionate communication of insight.
author: Leo Rosten

quote: Humor is what happens when we're told the truth quicker and more directly than we're used to.
author: George Saunders,  The Braindead Megaphone

quote: We don't appreciate the value of humor sometimes.
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: Humor is really one of the hardest things to define, very hard. And it's very ambiguous. You have it, or you don't. You can't attain it.
author: Heinrich Boll

quote: A mouth of no distinction but well practiced, before I entered my teens, in irony. For what is irony but the repository of hurt? And what is hurt but the repository of hope?
author: Joyce Carol Oates,  Faithless: Tales of Transgression

quote: Humor's a weapon if you want to make it one.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: ESL New immigrantswho've taken ESL (English as a Second Language),will always misunderstand sarcasm ~but those fuckers sure as shit enjoy the prices at Walmart.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I'm not an expert on the Malaysian sense of humor.
author: Ben Stiller

quote: In business, there are times when you disagree, and sometimes it turns out that you're just plain wrong. Humor takes away tension and helps you realize you're wrong.
author: Craig Newmark

quote: Humor's an excellent way to make a point more palatable and/or relatable.
author: Jen Lancaster

quote: A taste for irony has kept more hearts from breaking than a sense of humor, for it takes irony to appreciate the joke which is on oneself.
author: Jessamyn West

quote: Academics tend to have wonderfully infantile senses of humor.
author: John Lithgow

quote: Humor is reason gone mad.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Music is the only language in which you cannot say a mean or sarcastic thing.
author: John Erskine

quote: Sometimes it takes ten seconds to see some humor in your dilemmas, sometimes ten years.
author: Allen Klein

quote: I can't not put humor in a book.
author: Albert Brooks

quote: Humor is the most engaging cowardice.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: It is the ability to take a joke, not make one, that proves you have a sense of humor.
author: Max Eastman

quote: A joke's a very serious thing.
author: Charles Churchill

quote: I appreciate humor so much, but I'm actually not a funny girl.
author: Emmanuelle Chriqui

quote: Humor is just another defense against the universe.
author: Mel Brooks

quote: I don't have a disregard for my reader in humor pieces.
author: Ian Frazier
